|chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1100B; |chip2 = Maxim;MAX2820A; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== After FW load, the PID will change to b230.
The box w/ the UPC used in this entry notes the tag line as ''Bellsouth, Wi-Fi USB Adapter, 802.11b, W/less''.
